nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_659
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She wouldn't take a drink, much less would she stay for dinner.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_660
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He thought I was lying to him, whereas I was telling the truth.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_661
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: How do you account for the fact that you have been late every day this week?

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_662
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The increase in their profits is due partly to their new market strategy.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_663
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Such measures are likely to result in the improvement of work efficiency.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_664
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We have already poured a lot of time and energy into the project, so we have to carry on.
